name: Buildscape (Prototype)
description:
Buildscape is a casual game about building up a world on pc (vr coming later!), inspired hand in hand by Tiny Town. The power to create your own story with buildings and figures has never been easier! Build a world of unending size and fill it with hundreds or thousands of different objects!! Its really up to you!

The world is really in your hands

This game is an early prototype of a future release, any and all donations recieved will go into assets for the game to further develop. 

Feel free to join our discord if you're interested in the games and how its developing!

https://discord.gg/fCRMfgPCc9

Am aware of a few errors to do with the placement UI alignment amongst other things, working on fixes for those now
